law.text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law, a nonresident may hunt snow geese in this State without a resident or nonresident Maryland hunting license if:
The nonresident possesses a valid hunting license from the nonresident's home state;
The nonresident purchases a Maryland migratory game bird stamp; and
The nonresident's home state allows a Maryland resident to hunt snow geese without a nonresident hunting license from the home state in accordance with the following conditions:
The Maryland resident must possess a valid Maryland hunting license; and
The Maryland resident must purchase a migratory waterfowl stamp from the home state.
